Description:
Improvement Notice 1
Notice reference number - IN/PJW /GEC/280222/01

You have failed to ensure that the local exhaust ventilation systems provided for the control of substances hazardous to health (including welding fume, from stainless steel, which is a respiratory sensitiser, known to cause occupational hypersensitivity pneumonitis and occupational asthma) were thoroughly examined and tested within the previous 14 months.


Improvement Notice 1
Notice reference number - IN/PJW /GEC/280222/02

You have failed to identify employees who may be exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely
welding fume, which is a respiratory sensitiser, and place those employees under suitable health
surveillance.
